title: Digital leadership
description: Digital Leadership encompasses the skills, mindset, and strategies required to lead effectively in a digital environment. It goes beyond traditional leadership concepts, acknowledging that today's leaders must be agile, tech-savvy, and able to harness the power of data and technology to drive success.
